description: Fols. 4; 19.4 x 14.3 cm.; written surface 15.8 x 8.7 cm.; 25 lines to page; on glazed Arabic paper; in naskhi; with catchwords; entries in red. A tract in question and answer form discussing whether or not the periods of prayer as determined by astronomers agree with those of the jurists. Beg.: بسم الله ... ما تقول السادة الفقهاء أىمّة الدىن وعلماء Colophon: تم بحمد الله سبحانه وتعالى وعونه وحسن توفىقه والحمد لله وحده. تم MS is good condition; paper binding. Acquired from Brill, Leyden, A.D. 1900.
author: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, b. 1423
